Event Description: If any family is having trouble registering students, you are welcome to come in on July 30 from 12-7 or July 31 from 8-3.  You don't have to be a new student if you need assistance.  Phone calls are welcome, too.

If any family is having trouble registering students, you are welcome to come in on July 30 from 12-7 or July 31 from 8-3.  You don't have to be a new student if you need assistance.  Phone calls are welcome, too.

Students will begin their day with their CAT (Homeroom) teacher and will meet all of their teachers for all of their fall classes. Freshmen will meet their CAT Teacher in the theater. Signs will be posted to help students know where to go and teachers will be available to help guide students if needed.
